document.docAuthor: Ruan, Yongying, Yang, Xingke, Konstantinov, Alexander S., Prathapan, Kaniyarikkal D. & Zhang, Mengna
document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the Oriental Chaetocnema species (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae, Alticini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the Oriental Chaetocnema species (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae, Alticini)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Plectroscelis puncticollis
Motschulsky, 1858: 107
. TL: India . TD: ZMUM.

Plectroscelis discreta
Baly, 1876: 596
. TL: China , Xinjiang (Kin Kiang). TD: BMNH. Synonymized by Medvedev, 2006.
Plectroscelis granulifrons
Baly, 1876: 596
. TL: China . TD: BMNH. Synonymized by
Heikertinger, 1951: 214
.

Chaetocnema kanika
Maulik, 1926: 216
. TL: India . TD: IMCI. Synonymized by
Scherer, 1969: 163
.

Chaetocnema ( Chaetocnema ) puncticollis :
Konstantinov et al. , 2011: 19
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Description: Description is not provided here, as this species has already been revised by
Konstantinov et al. (2011)
(as
Chaetocnema discreta
).

Type:

Remarks:
C. puncticollis
closely resembles
C. furthi
(see “Remarks” section under
C. furthi
).
